verbs.description: [ARG1: Crude futures] [V: turned] [ARGM-DIR: sharply] [ARGM-MNR: lower] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump said he would not tolerate OPEC boosting oil prices] .
Crude futures turned sharply lower after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he would not tolerate OPEC boosting oil prices] .
Crude futures turned sharply lower after President Donald Trump said he [V: would] not tolerate OPEC boosting oil prices .
Crude futures turned sharply lower after President Donald Trump said [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: tolerate] [ARG1: OPEC boosting oil prices] .
Crude futures turned sharply lower after President Donald Trump said he would not tolerate [ARG0: OPEC] [V: boosting] [ARG1: oil prices] .
